blocks.name: lmodvsmdi
blocks.content: Multiple distributive law for scalar product (left-distributivity). (Contributed by AV, 5-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmodvsmdi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cn0), wcel(c4, c5))), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(c3, c7, c4)), co(co(c3, c8, c1), c6, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c9))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cmg, c9))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, clmod), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cn0), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(c3, c7, c4)), co(co(c3, c8, c1), c6, c4)))
  3imp(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cn0), wcel(c4, c5), wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(c3, c7, c4)), co(co(c3, c8, c1), c6, c4))))
  com12(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cn0), wi(wcel(c4, c5), wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(c3, c7, c4)), co(co(c3, c8, c1), c6, c4)))))
  exp4c(wcel(c3, cn0), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(c3, c7, c4)), co(co(c3, c8, c1), c6, c4)))
  nn0ind(hs0, hs1, c3, wi(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(c0, clmod)), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(c3, c7, c4)), co(co(c3, c8, c1), c6, c4))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(c0, clmod)), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(cv(hs0), c7, c4)), co(co(cv(hs0), c8, c1), c6, c4))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(c0, clmod)), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(nat0, c7, c4)), co(co(nat0, c8, c1), c6, c4))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(c0, clmod)), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(cv(hs1), c7, c4)), co(co(cv(hs1), c8, c1), c6, c4))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(c0, clmod)), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c7, c4)), co(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c8, c1), c6, c4))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(c0, clmod)), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(cv(hs0), c7, c4)), co(co(cv(hs0), c8, c1), c6, c4)), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(nat0, c7, c4)), co(co(nat0, c8, c1), c6, c4)))
  eqeq12d(co(c1, c6, co(cv(hs0), c7, c4)), co(co(cv(hs0), c8, c1), c6, c4), co(c1, c6, co(nat0, c7, c4)), co(co(nat0, c8, c1), c6, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  oveq2d(c1, c6, co(cv(hs0), c7, c4), co(nat0, c7, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), nat0, c7, c4)
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), c8, c1), c6, c4, co(nat0, c8, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), nat0, c8, c1)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(c0, clmod)), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(cv(hs0), c7, c4)), co(co(cv(hs0), c8, c1), c6, c4)), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(cv(hs1), c7, c4)), co(co(cv(hs1), c8, c1), c6, c4)))

  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c7, c4)

  oveq1(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c8, c1)

blocks.name: gsumlsscl
blocks.content: Closure of a group sum in a linear subspace: A (finitely supported) sum of scalar multiplications of vectors of a subset of a linear subspace is also contained in the linear subspace. (Contributed by AV, 20-Apr-2019.) (Revised by AV, 28-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumlsscl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wi(wa(wcel(c4, co(c5, cmap, c3)), wbr(c4, cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c6))), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c3, co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(s0)))), c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c4, co(c5, cmap, c3)), wbr(c4, cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c6))), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c3, co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(s0)))), c1))

  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c4, co(c5, cmap, c3)), wbr(c4, cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c6))), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))

  imp(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c4, co(c5, cmap, c3)), wbr(c4, cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c6)))), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5))
  ad2antrl(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(c4, co(c5, cmap, c3)), wbr(c4, cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c6)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5)))
  syl(wcel(c4, co(c5, cmap, c3)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5)), wf(c4, c3, c5))
  elmapi(c4, c5, c3)

  ffvelrn(c4, c3, c5, cv(s0))
  imp(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c4, co(c5, cmap, c3)), wbr(c4, cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c6)))), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c1))

  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))

thm gsumlsscl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)→((c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6))→(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c4 ` s0)[(× ` c0)]s0)))∈ c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  ex((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6)), (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c4 ` s0)[(× ` c0)]s0)))∈ c1)
  gsumsubgcl(c0, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c4 ` s0)[(× ` c0)]s0)), c1, (0 ` c0), c3, universe, ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)∧(c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6))))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  adantr((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6)), c0 ∈ Abel)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ⊆ c1, c0 ∈ Abel)
  lmodabl(c0)
  adantr((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6)), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantr((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6)), c1 ∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  syl((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), c1 ∈(SubGrp ` c0), (c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  lsssubg(c0, c1, c2)
  fmpttd(s0, c3, ((c4 ` s0)[(× ` c0)]s0), c1, ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)∧(c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6))))
  syl12anc((((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)∧(c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6)))∧ s0 ∈ c3), ((c4 ` s0)[(× ` c0)]s0)∈ c1, (c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c4 ` s0)∈ c5, s0 ∈ c1)
  adantr(((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)∧(c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6))), s0 ∈ c3, (c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  adantr((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6)), (c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  3simpa(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ⊆ c1)
  imp(((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)∧(c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6))), s0 ∈ c3, (c4 ` s0)∈ c5)
  ad2antrl((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3), c4[finSupp](0 ` c6), (s0 ∈ c3 →(c4 ` s0)∈ c5))
  syl(c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3), (s0 ∈ c3 →(c4 ` s0)∈ c5), (c4 : c3 → c5))
  elmapi(c4, c5, c3)
  ex((c4 : c3 → c5), s0 ∈ c3, (c4 ` s0)∈ c5)
  ffvelrn(c4, c3, c5, s0)
  imp(((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)∧(c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6))), s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈ c1)
  adantr((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6)), (s0 ∈ c3 → s0 ∈ c1))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ⊆ c1, (s0 ∈ c3 → s0 ∈ c1))
  ssel(c3, c1, s0)
  lssvscl(c0, c1, c2, (c4 ` s0), c5, s0, (× ` c0), c6)
  eqid((× ` c0))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)∧(c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6))), (s0 ∈ c3 ↦((c4 ` s0)[(× ` c0)]s0))[finSupp](0 ` c0), (c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c3 ∈ P((Base ` c0))), c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3), c4[finSupp](0 ` c6))
  adantr((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6)), (c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c3 ∈ P((Base ` c0))))
  jca((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), c0 ∈ LMod, c3 ∈ P((Base ` c0)))
  simp1(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ⊆ c1)
  mpbird((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), c3 ∈ P((Base ` c0)), c3 ⊆(Base ` c0))
  3imp(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆(Base ` c0))
  a1i(c0 ∈ LMod, (c1 ∈ c2 →(c3 ⊆ c1 → c3 ⊆(Base ` c0))))
  syl(c1 ∈ c2, (c3 ⊆ c1 → c3 ⊆(Base ` c0)), c1 ⊆(Base ` c0))
  lssss(c1, c2, (Base ` c0), c0)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  expcom(c1 ⊆(Base ` c0), c3 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆(Base ` c0))
  sstr(c3, c1, (Base ` c0))
  syl((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c3 ∈ P((Base ` c0))↔ c3 ⊆(Base ` c0)), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  3adant1(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ⊆ c1, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  ancoms(c1 ∈ c2, c3 ⊆ c1, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssexg(c3, c1, c2)
  elpwg(c3, universe, (Base ` c0))
  simprl((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3), c4[finSupp](0 ` c6))
  simprr((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3), c4[finSupp](0 ` c6))
  scmfsupp(s0, c0, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3)∧ c4[finSupp](0 ` c6)))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ⊆ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, clmod)
  diff.clmod.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c3, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c4 ∈(c5[↦]c3), c4[finSupp](0 ` c6))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c4, (c5[↦]c3))
  diff.co.s(s0, c5, cmap, c3)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c4, cfsupp, (0 ` c6))
  diff.cfsupp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0g, c6)
  diff.c0g.s(s0)
}
